subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Orb, ridden by Joel Rosario, found a way to win despite his lack of experience on a wet track, trudging to victory Saturday at Churchill Downs.
snippet: Orb, ridden by Joel Rosario, found a way to win despite his lack of experience on a wet track, trudging to victory Saturday at Churchill Downs.
